name: Interdimesional Hero
description:
Codebase is mine besides save/load system that I was inspired (a lot)  by this: 

https://github.com/trevermock/save-load-system/tree/2-save-load-implemented

Graphic assets also aren't mine: most of them are freebies from https://craftpix.net

UI - https://mmkhlv.itch.io/game-interface-ui-kit

Icons:

https://wenrexa.itch.io/icons1

https://gatoparty.itch.io/gem-pack

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/free-rpg-fantasy-spell-icons-...

Backgrounds created by AI

Music:

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

What, your'e still reading? Stop, and go smash that mouse button!

And if you apprecieated (or not) , I wouldn't mind any feedback.
